author: craigmcc
msg: Update the navigation bar to point at the new tag library for HTML.

author: craigmcc
msg: More updates to the TODO lists.

author: craigmcc
msg: Close the XML parser input source (handed to the digester) in a "finally"
block so that it is closed even if the parser throws an exception.

author: craigmcc
msg: Refactor the processActionPerform() method to split out the process of
calling the Action class from processing the ActionForward that is
returned.  Now, you can override either or both of these methods, as
needed, for adding customized post-processing of the Action.
